alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Ste. Genevieve (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 4:31PM CDT until July 08 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Western Randolph County in southwestern Illinois... Southeastern Jefferson County in east central Missouri... Northwestern Ste. Genevieve County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 431 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bloomsdale, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bloomsdale around 440 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 154 and 162. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
